attributes.action: Bill Bailey Should Be Compelled By Law to Represent the UK in Eurovision
attributes.additional_details:
For many years the UK has struggled to make headway in Europe’s premier song competition. For too long we have attempted to mimic the approach of other nations. Now we must lead. There is one who has both beard and talent, and could lead our people out of the darkness. He is Bill Bailey

May the spiders not betray us
